Arcade.name: Namco 1/12 Scale Model Upright Arcade Game Machine: Galaxian
Arcade.description: Most of us stateside have enjoy the upright arcade cabinet from years ago.  Equally, Japan had uprights very early on.  Some of Namco's most popular titles - Pac-Man, Rally-X, Galaga, Galaxian, and Tank Battalion - were part of this era.  Now, you can own a collection of tiny, colorful uprights featuring these games

Arcade.name: Seimitsu LSX-NOBI-01 Pro Edition Joystick
Arcade.description: The Bullet lever handle is the most notable at 29mm, with height at 45mm. Its shape is unlike anything seen before. The restrictor plate in both Standard and Pro models are designed for smooth transition across the corners.
